statements: SELECT * FROM home_appliances_energy_usage;
SELECT appliance_name, power_consumption FROM home_appliances_energy_usage ORDER BY appliance_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM home_appliances_energy_usage WHERE energy_consumed > 100;
SELECT appliance_name, appliance_type, usage_duration FROM home_appliances_energy_usage WHERE power_consumption < 50;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_consumed FROM home_appliances_energy_usage ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT * FROM home_appliances_energy_usage ORDER BY appliance_name DESC, energy_consumed ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT appliance_name, energy_consumed FROM home_appliances_energy_usage WHERE power_consumption > 100 AND appliance_type = 'Refrigerator'
SELECT SUM(power_consumption) AS total_power_consumption, AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_energy_consumed FROM home_appliances_energy_usage
SELECT * FROM home_appliances_energy_usage WHERE appliance_name LIKE 'W%' AND energy_consumed BETWEEN 10 AND 50
SELECT appliance_name, appliance_type FROM home_appliances_energy_usage ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC
SELECT * FROM appliances;
SELECT appliance_name, wattage FROM appliances;
SELECT appliance_name, wattage FROM appliances WHERE wattage > 100;
SELECT appliance_name, wattage FROM appliances ORDER BY wattage DESC;
SELECT appliance_name, wattage FROM appliances WHERE appliance_name = 'Refrigerator';
SELECT * FROM appliances WHERE appliance_name = 'Fridge';
SELECT appliance_name, wattage FROM appliances ORDER BY wattage DESC;

SELECT appliances.appliance_name, energy_usage.usage_date, energy_usage.energy_consumed FROM appliances JOIN energy_usage ON appliances.appliance_id = energy_usage.appliance_id WHERE energy_consumed > 10 ORDER BY usage_date ASC;
SELECT appliance_name, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM appliances JOIN energy_usage ON appliances.appliance_id = energy_usage.appliance_id GROUP BY appliance_name;

SELECT appliances.appliance_name, energy_usage.usage_date, energy_usage.usage_time FROM appliances LEFT JOIN energy_usage ON appliances.appliance_id = energy_usage.appliance_id WHERE energy_usage.usage_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '17:00:00';
SELECT * FROM appliance_data ORDER BY appliance_name ASC;
SELECT appliance_name, power_consumption FROM appliance_data WHERE power_consumption > 50;
SELECT appliance_name, usage_date FROM appliance_data JOIN usage_data ON appliance_data.appliance_id = usage_data.appliance_id;
SELECT MAX(power_consumption) AS max_power_consumption FROM appliance_data;
SELECT location_name, COUNT(appliance_id) AS num_appliances FROM location_data JOIN appliance_data ON location_data.location_id = appliance_data.appliance_id GROUP BY location_name;
SELECT * FROM appliance_data WHERE power_consumption > 50 ORDER BY appliance_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT appliance_name, power_consumption FROM appliance_data WHERE appliance_name LIKE 'Fridge%' OR appliance_name LIKE 'Washing%' ORDER BY power_consumption ASC;

SELECT appliance_name, usage_hours FROM appliance_data JOIN usage_data ON appliance_data.appliance_id = usage_data.appliance_id WHERE usage_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY usage_hours DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location_name, appliance_name, power_consumption FROM location_data JOIN appliance_data ON location_data.location_id = appliance_data.appliance_id ORDER BY location_name, appliance_name;
SELECT AVG(power_consumption) AS avg_power_consumption FROM appliance_data WHERE power_consumption > 0;
SELECT * FROM appliances_usage
SELECT appliance_name, energy_consumed FROM appliances_usage ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC
SELECT household_id, address, num_residents FROM households
SELECT type_name FROM appliance_types ORDER BY type_name
SELECT * FROM appliance_category
SELECT * FROM appliances_usage ORDER BY usage_hours DESC;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_consumed FROM appliances_usage WHERE usage_hours > 5;
SELECT household_id, address, num_residents FROM households WHERE num_residents <= 4;
SELECT * FROM appliance_types WHERE type_name LIKE '%fridge%';
SELECT a.appliance_name, c.category_name FROM appliances_usage a JOIN appliance_category c ON a.appliance_id = c.category_id;
SELECT * FROM appliances_usage ORDER BY appliance_name ASC, power_consumption DESC
SELECT appliance_id, appliance_name, power_consumption FROM appliances_usage WHERE appliance_type = 'Refrigerator'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_appliances FROM appliances_usage

SELECT appliance_name, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM appliances_usage INNER JOIN appliance_logs ON appliances_usage.appliance_id = appliance_logs.appliance_id GROUP BY appliance_name

SELECT appliance_id, appliance_name, location_name FROM appliances_usage LEFT JOIN appliance_location ON appliances_usage.appliance_id = appliance_location.appliance_id LEFT JOIN locations ON appliance_location.location_id = locations.location_id ORDER BY location_name ASC
SELECT * FROM appliances_usage WHERE power_consumption > 100
SELECT appliance_name, appliance_type FROM appliances_usage WHERE usage_hours_per_day < 8
SELECT appliance_name, power_consumption FROM appliances_usage WHERE appliance_type = 'Refrigerator'
SELECT appliance_name, energy_consumed FROM appliances_usage JOIN appliance_logs ON appliances_usage.appliance_id = appliance_logs.appliance_id

SELECT location_name, category_name FROM locations JOIN appliance_location ON locations.location_id = appliance_location.location_id JOIN appliance_categories ON appliance_location.appliance_id = appliance_categories.category_id
